_comment: This json file contains mixtures. Mixtures are comprised of several materials. Dilutions of materials are considered to be mixtures. Try to keep this data alphabetized.

mixtures.name: Triplal
mixtures.scent: Powerful, green, just-mowed-grass odor. Has the refreshing tartness of bergamot peel.
mixtures.usage: Great for creating a green accord. It blends beautifully with fruity, citrus, and floral compositions.
